item.description: My name is Marc Helbling. I’m a software engineer with a Ph.D thesis (“Virtual sculpture using particles system”). I’ve been an early stage engineer in some successful startups. I am now working on search relevance at Algolia. I am mostly interested in building efficient teams and systems, with a special ❤️ when they deal with vertices and polygons. The posts on this blog are evolving things so the content may be updated/rewritten without any warning.
